message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. Accept and we can shake on it.
I'll give you a small share, but I'm the one who's going to make the big decisions!
Not a chance, Bob. I'm not going to let you take all the power. Make a better offer!
Meet me in the middle, Bob. Let's make a deal.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still the one who's driving the deal!
You're not driving the deal, Bob. I'm not giving in to your demands. Make a better offer or we'll keep going!
It's time to split it 50/50, Bob. No more games.
